page.title: 14Sports clubs rule O.K.!
page.content: Those parts of Woodham Walter and Ulting which fall within our area have no clubs sited there although people belong to some in their villages. At Langford there are several clubs. The Cricket Club is open to all but the pitch is owned by the Water Works.There is a village football team and a tennis club.The tennis club is private and most members come from outside the village. There is a social club in the village but many people travel to nearby Maldon to belong to clubs and attend evening classes.
